name: The Scorpion Insurgency
declaringWar: Our goal is to conquer the world and destroy those who DARE to get in our way. And you are one of them. So prepare yourself, prepare yourself for your end!
attacked: You fool, do you really think you can defeat us? Fine then, I will make sure that the Scorpion Insurgency show no mercy to you!
defeated: You may have won this war. But soon, the Scorpion Insurgency will rise again, and you will soon fall.
introduction: Hold it right there! I am Trevor William, I lead the Scorpion Insurgency. Listen, I have an advice for you. Stay out of our way, and you will be spared.
tradeRequest: I am not always this generous, so take it before I change my mind...
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [50]% chance>

name: The Defenders and Protectors of the Universe
startIntroPart1: Hey, Berserker! Look, I know you're confused right now, but I can explain. It appears we have been teleported to another universe by some sort of a wormhole. But it's not just us, every factions from our world has been transported here. Also, I don't know why, but it looks like the teleportation made most us forget about things. So don't be surprised too much if an ally from our world doesn't recognize us or something.
startIntroPart2: I'll find a way to sort this out. Zachary, and the other high researchers will also help. For now, you take the lead of the D.A.P.U, okay? I'll see you soon.
declaringWar: I can't let you be here for much longer. So, prepare yourself.
defeated: Well, all is lost! I hope you're happy with yourself, because everyone who isn't from this universe can't go home because of you!
introduction: Oh, hey there. The Leader is currently busy with something, so I'm taking charge here. Most people call me the Berserker, but you can call me Marcus if you want.
tradeRequest: Hello again, I have some offers to make. Hope this suits you well.
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
